content:
by  Jeff HargartenPublished  March  

A funeral director analyzing Trayvon Martins body said there were no signs of a violent struggle NY Daily News reported PERIOD

The director Richard Kurtz told CBS Newsthere were no bruises cuts or scrapes indicative of a fight between Martin and George Zimmerman the man accused of pulling the trigger PERIOD

Kurtzs claims contradict the story Zimmerman told about being attacked by Martin for several minutes before he shot the 17yearold in selfdefense PERIOD Zimmerman said Martin had smashed his head into the pavement and punched him PERIOD

An approximately5000strong demonstration in solidarity with Martin marched from Northrop Mall through Dinkytown and the Stadium Village Thursday evening PERIOD Protesters chanted and donned hooded sweatshirts PERIOD
